dict.acceptation: 平底锅；盘状的器皿；淘盘子，金盘，秤盘；
淘金；在浅锅中烹调（食物）；[非正式用语]严厉的批评；
淘金；在淘洗中收获金子；

sent.orig: PAN-based carbon fiber (PAN-ACF) have better adsorption property of hydrogen sulfide (H_2S) than other carbon materials.
sent.trans: 聚丙烯腈基活性炭纤维(PAN-ACF)对硫化氢(H_2S)有比其他活性炭材料更强的吸附能力。

sent.orig: PAN fiber was prepared, using wet spinning method, and preoxidated under different temperature gradient.
sent.trans: 本论文通过湿法纺丝工艺制备PAN纤维，再在温度梯度不同的若干恒温区中进行连续预氧化。

sent.orig: Polyacrylonitrile carbon fiber (PAN-CF) was tension carbonized at different temperatures and then graphitized.
sent.trans: 在不同温度下对聚丙烯腈基炭纤维(PAN-CF)进行张力炭化处理并进行高温石墨化。

sent.orig: Finally, a model of anodic oxidation of PAN HM carbon fiber were proposed.
sent.trans: 根据实验结果，提出了PAN基高模炭纤维的氧化模型。

sent.orig: Molecular sieving effect of the ACF based PAN was found during adsorption.
sent.trans: 在吸附时，PAN基ACF呈现出明显的分子筛效应。
